rewrite1:
Please adjust the formatting in the document as follows:

- In the fifth paragraph, revert any text that is italicized to a regular font style and adjust the right indent so that it is decreased by two characters.

- For the third paragraph, change the outline level to 'Body Text', ensure that none of the text is bolded, switch the font to Calibri, and add a space of 1.5 cm after the paragraph.
rewrite2:

For the fifth paragraph, please revert any italicized text to a regular typeface and then apply a negative right indent of two characters.

Moving on to the third paragraph, change the Outline level setting to 'Body Text.' Ensure that any bold formatting is removed. Then, switch the font to Calibri and set the spacing to include a 1.5 cm gap after the paragraph.
